sourcesContent:
Your Profile Information
Full Name is Required
It should not contain a digit or any kind of special symbol
Gender is Required
Date of birth is required
Address is Required
Contact No is required
It should not contain characters
It should be a 10 digit number
Its not a valid number
Email Id is Required
Email Id is not in the correct format
Designation is required
Designation must not contain any digit and any special symbol except dot symbol
Degree is required
Degree must not contain any digit and any special symbol except dot symbol
